qas.question: What was the name of the chthonic dragon?
which spring emitted vapors that caused the oracle at Delphi to give her prophecies?

answers.text: the sacred cave at Delphi. Apollo

qas.question: Who was a parent of Python?

context: Four days after his birth, Apollo killed the chthonic dragon <a0_0>Python<a0_0/>, which lived in Delphi beside the <a1_0>Castalian Spring<a1_0/>. This was the spring which emitted vapors that caused the oracle at Delphi to give her prophecies. Hera sent the serpent to hunt <a2_0>Leto<a2_0/> to her death across the world. To protect his mother, Apollo begged Hephaestus for a bow and arrows. After receiving them, Apollo cornered Python in <a3_0>the sacred cave at Delphi. Apollo<a3_0/> killed Python but had to be punished for it, since Python was a child of <a4_0>Gaia<a4_0/>.
